markdownRemark.html: The Tennis Club of Estepona was founded in 1988 by Fernando Gil and offers a tennis academy and services. The facilities includes - five clay courts, six clay track courts, six turf padel courts and six synthetic grass courts.

frontmatter.title: Club de Tenis de Estepona
frontmatter.description: Club de Tenis de Estepona - The Tennis Club of Estepona was founded in 1988 by Fernando Gil and offers a tennis academy and services. The facilities includes - five clay courts, six clay track courts, six turf padel courts and six synthetic grass courts.
tags: Top things to do with kids in Costa del Sol
